dublin_core.dcvalue: Telemedicine is defined as the practice of medicine from a distance without the doctor s physical presence Teleoncology consist of telediagnosis teleconsultation telepathology telesurgery distant help in computer aided radiotherapy planning and telefollow up In this paper we present the wide range of possibilities in providing cancer care at a distance The theoretical and practical aspects of teleoncology and its current as well as future role in a multidisciplinary approach to cancer patients are discussed
The new dimension of oncology. Teleoncology ante portas.
